title: Under-The-Radar African Safari Rwanda The Points Guy

type_specific.selection: First-time visitors to Africa tend to gravitate toward well-known destinations like South Africa, Kenya and Tanzania, but in this new travel series, TPG Special Contributor Eric Rosen sheds light on five of southern Africa’s other great safari destinations. The first post covered Zambia, and today, we continue with Rwanda. As inspiration for travelers looking to experience...
